description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Daylesford, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Boutique Daylesford Spa Country Retreat Just 90 Minutes from Melbourne with Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: Embrace Daylesford's majestic natural scenery with a boutique Parisian-style stay, only a 90-minute drive from Melbourne. A private haven of just 15 unique rooms, Hotel Frangos offers the perfect retreat for those wanting to leave the hustle and bustle behind and experience the tranquillity of picturesque country Victoria. Spend your time taste-testing the local wine at one of the region's many vineyards, enjoy a picnic at the picturesque Lake Daylesford, dine your way through the town's array of hatted restaurants or refresh your body, mind and soul in Hepburn Springs' famous mineral waters. This rural retreat is also home to the charming Koukla cafe, serving a wide selection of locally sourced favourites, sweet treats, cocktails and wine under the vine-covered verandah. Full of character and distinctive design, Hotel Frangos offers a wonderful opportunity for travellers to lose themselves within one of Victoria’s most cherished leisure regions.

seo.title: Hôtels à Daylesford - Australie Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Daylesford, Australia avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
